name: Stone Generator
explanation: Stones for resource and construction tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. See also: metal.json. Authors: Johnn Four, Jochen Linnemann, Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.

tables.name: stone
tables.explanation: Subtables present stone types known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and  get more specialized towards the end. Modern and scifi subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with the default fantasy setting. Some subtables intentionally overlap.
